category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ChangeItemRevision_Cfg0AbsConfiguratorWSO_default_relation
preference.preference_description: Specifies the relation to be created when a Configurator Workspace Object is pasted under a Change Item Revision. The specified relation becomes the default relation created between a Configurator Workspace Object and the target Change Item Revision. Valid values are CMHasProblemItem and CMReferences. The default value is "CMHasProblemItem".
